about_the_game:
This game work is jointly produced by the player group of the mobile game "Dancing Line" issued by Cheetah Mobile Inc.

Game play:

You need to follow the music rhythm and click on the screen to control the rotation of lines, cross obstacles and traps until you reach the end.

This game includes the following:

1. There are more than 30 independent checkpoints.
2. There are 10 types of lines.
3. More different challenge models will be introduced in the future.

About game levels:

1. Each level has a different name, theme and music.
2. The difficulty of each level is different for different players.
3. The difficulty of the level is divided into five levels, which will be displayed in the form of ★ on the game selection page. The more ★, the greater the difficulty.

Other precautions:

This work is a team game jointly made by the player group and is not used for commercial purposes. If this game infringes on your rights and interests, please contact us for off shelf processing.

legal_notice: This game belongs to the fan-made of "Dancing Line". It is not officially released and will not be used for commercial purposes. The game is currently a beta version, and the content is not yet perfect. If the game infringes the copyright of any enterprise or organization, please contact the developer for off shelf processing. Without the permission of the developer, it is strictly prohibited to modify, steal and implant the code of the game without authorization. All levels included in this game have been authorized by the original author.
name: Dancing Line Fan-made Collection

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: "Dancing Line Fan-made Collection" will bring you a wonderful music journey. In the game, you need to follow the music rhythm, click the screen to control the rotation of lines, cross obstacles and traps until you reach the end. Each level is a wonderful journey.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
